channel.title: Help Wikipedia
channel.description:
Maybe some of you haven't noticed yet but Wikipedia has started a fundraiser, I for one love Wikipedia, it has saved my ass in some tight situations whether it is projects, news or a will to learn something, all I do is type in te subject.
I already donated 30$, although it is worth a lot more. But I encourage you to do the same, because as we all know it is a great site and they deserve something for setting up a free resource center :)
http://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Fundraising
~ VG
